name: Circus Tesserae
description:
Made in 50 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice"

Play in your browser, or on your phone!

Note - If running on mobile, make sure the game opens in landscape mode.

Circus Tessarae is a game of juggling dice. Click and drag to swipe the dice. This will keep them in the air, and rotate them. Get them in the right orientation, knock them into barrels, avoid nasty bombs, and be wary of inverted dice!

Credits

  • Game Design and Programming - Mystical Pidgeon
  • Start Screen and UI Elements - AmusedWall
  • Game Background - Horse-tail
  • Sound Effects - Studio Traumkosmos
  • Additional Sound Effects
    • Failure Buzzer - https://freesound.org/people/bolkmar/sounds/529246/
    • Success Bell - https://freesound.org/people/SamsterBirdies/sounds/486088/
  • Music
    • Main Menu - https://freesound.org/people/murcielago123/sounds/81459/
    • In Game - https://freesound.org/people/tpainterforfun/sounds/539512/
  • Models
    • Dice - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/dice-d6-game-ready-pbr-2001...
    • Bomb and Barrel - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/props-3d-221035
